data.value: Combining regular and irregular verbs of our Portuguese language in all tenses

data.name: DouaiSecondDescription
data.value: You can use this: Present, Imperfect, Perfect Present, more-than-perfect past, future, future of this, the present conditional, imperfect subjunctive tense, future subjunctive, imperative , infinitive and gerund.

data.name: LyonDescription
data.value: Calculate and converts easily minutes, turning in hours, days, or even years or seconds. Perfect app for those who like to do marathons series and need to know how many episodes you can watch up to your next appointment, or you going to the movies and you want to eat something later, but can not miss the bus schedule. Do not waste time counting!

data.name: LyonShortDescription3
data.value: Calculate and converts easily minutes, turning in hours, days, or even years or seconds.

data.name: NiceDescription
data.value:
Isn't rare occasions where we need to give away someone with this application is easy. Just add the track numbers to be drawn and it will do the work for you. Try it.
Now it can do decimal numbers!

data.value: Isn't rare occasions where we need to give away someone with this application is easy.

data.name: PasadenaDescription
data.value:
A game can destroy as well as to strengthen friendships. Take stronger drink, or that is closer to you, and will play the famous 'Never ever' , where every time you've done something that it is showed on the screen you should drink. The rule is simple, the game is known, then what are you waiting? Call your closest friends for a round of 'Never ever'.
It is more than 600 sentences (in Portuguese for now)

data.name: VegasDescription
data.value: Those who never played such a game like this or have never heard that throw the first stone! The best game of truth and consequence that the Windows Store has seen so far, has several bottles according to the occasion (in family, in the square, between friends, drunk, with the bests , alone,in the classroom and among couples) , with questions and pre-defined challenges is fun in the right esste application!
